title: Hells Angels
summary: The Hells Angels Motorcycle Club (HAMC) is a worldwide one-percenter motorcycle club whose members typically ride Harley-Davidson motorcycles. In the United States and Canada, the Hells Angels are incorporated as the Hells Angels Motorcycle Corporation. Common nicknames for the club are the "H.A.", "Red & White", "HAMC", and "81".[7] With a membership of between 3,000 and 3,600[6] and 467 charters located in 59 countries, the HAMC is the largest motorcycle club in the world.[8]
